duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, implement, and optimize the Epic EHR to enhance patient care quality and safety, improve health outcomes, enable innovation and research, and optimize revenue cycle processes.
Lead team development and management, consensus building, and analyze existing procedures to recommend modifications and develop and monitor budgets.
Manage multiple concurrent objectives, projects, groups, or activities, making effective judgments as to prioritizing and time allocation.
Plan, organize, monitor, and control IT projects ensuring the utilization of technical resources to better achieve project objectives.
Protect the security, confidentiality, and ensure appropriate security controls are in place and effective.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer information science, management, healthcare administration, or a healthcare-related field (Master’s Degree Preferred)
